inclusion.criterion: Patients older than 16 years with well-differentiated papillary or follicular thyroid cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: thyroid cancer stage I or II, according to the NTCTCS classification at time of surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients younger than 45 years with any size of primary papillary or follicular tumor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients older than 45 years with: primary papillary tumor less than 4 cm or primary follicular tumor less than 1 cm
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with postsurgical thyroid remnant more than 5 g
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients above 45 years of age having: known cervical lymph nodes metastases
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer, but meets inclusion criteria for age and tumor size. Exclusion criterion of known cervical lymph nodes metastases is a concern.
